  • Method Details

    • insert

      public boolean insert​(Node n)
      Inserts a node forcing updates to any node already present
      Parameters:
      n - Node to insert
      Returns:
      true if the node is inserted else false

    • insert

      public boolean insert​(Node n, boolean shouldUpdate)
      Inserts a node into the tree optionally forcing updates.
      Parameters:
      n - Node to be inserted
      shouldUpdate - Specifies whether preexisting nodes should be updated based off of the information stored in n.
      Returns:
      true if the node was inserted else false

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(java.lang.String username)
      Removes a node with the specified username
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the node that should be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the node was removed else false

    • search

      public void search​(PointLike p, java.util.List<Node> list)
      Finds all nodes in a certain region of the tree
      Parameters:
      p - Point specifying the region
      list - List reference, populated with the does found by search

    • isDivided

      public boolean isDivided()
      Gets if the current tree, or subtree is divided.
      Returns:
      true if the current tree or subtree is divided.

    • isQuadrantDivided

      public boolean isQuadrantDivided​(int i)
      Checks if quadrant is divided.
      Parameters:
      i - Quadrant number ordered clockwise starting at top left == 1
      Returns:
      true if the specified quadrant is divided.

    • restructureNode

      public boolean restructureNode​(Node n)
      Restructures a node after it has been updated.
      Parameters:
      n - Node to be restructured (replaced in the tree).
      Returns:
      true if the node was successfully restructured.

    • getNodeCount

      public long getNodeCount()
      Gets the number of nodes in the tree
      Returns:
      number of nodes in tree

    • getNodeCountForQuadrant

      public long getNodeCountForQuadrant​(short qn) throws java.lang.Exception
      Gets the number of nodes in a quadrant
      Parameters:
      qn - quadrant number
      Returns:
      number of nodes in the specified quadrant.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If tree is not divided, an exception is thrown.

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode​(Node n)
      Removes a specific node from the tree.
      Parameters:
      n - The node to be removed.
